item.title: Recent repair already half disintegrated, 6th December
item.description:
Following previous Web Reference: 6646604 ; Enquiry Number: 22061360..... The heart-shaped pothole recently repaired is quickly disintegrating again. Could it be reviewed again please ? Thanks !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 359, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Huge potholes & road surface washed away due to a constant water leak under the road., 6th December
item.description:
Large potholes & road surface washed away now unavoidable to miss due to it getting bigger & being now in the middle of the road. Top end of North Road West near Grovefield Way. Road always wet due to water leak under the road which also needs fixing as it’s been like it for many months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, North Road West, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road was re surfaced but due to damaged pavement drains in road was left in complete., 6th December
item.description:
The road damage is 50m long and 1 meters wide. the suface is 4inches deep in the road . Floods., reduced width of road. not room for cars to pass. No pavement one side. Not enough room on the other side pavement for children to pass as cars have to go on the pavement., This effect houses 9...11...15....17.....19. Raised complaint with the council who say until road repaired (as solictors argueing) they will not repair. HELP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven pavements & massive pothole on pavement outside no 15, 6th December
item.description:
People using mobility strollers prefer to use the road as the road is more even than the pavement. Several disabled people are fed up with the problem. Boverton Avenue pavements look like a patch work quilt,. The uneven surfaces and pothole create hazards.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Boverton Avenue, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes getting bigger and deeper by bus stop, 6th December
item.description:
Gloucester Road, by bus stop outside 187 and 185 Gloucester Road. So many potholes. Pavement vibrates as does house when heavy traffic passes over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
